Keyboard shortcuts for Postman

A visual cheat-sheet for the 23 keyboard shortcuts found in Postman

Original Reference Report Issue

Navigational Shortcuts

Focus Sidebar

  • Ctrl
  • Alt
  • 1

Focus Builder

  • Ctrl
  • Alt
  • 2

Focus on #th tab

  • Ctrl
  • #

Switch between tabs

  • Ctrl
  • Shift
  • /

Move to next item

  • Down

Move to previous item

  • Up

Expand collection/folder

  • Right

Collapse collection/folder

  • Left

Select current AND next item

  • Shift
  • Down

Select current AND previous item

  • Shift
  • Up

Search sidebar

  • Ctrl
  • F

Open request in a tab

  • Enter

  • S
